name: 10-4 Magazine
notes: 10-4 Magazine is a monthly trucker magazine created for people who love trucking — especially owner-operators, company drivers, small fleet owners, and trucking enthusiasts.

name: Active Transportation Alliance Blog
notes: The Active Transportation Alliance is a coalition of people who are working to make walking, biking, and public transit safe and equitable options for getting around Chicagoland. The mission of Active Transportation Alliance is to advocate for walking, bicycling, and public transit to create healthy, sustainable, and equitable communities.

name: Air Cargo Next
notes: Founded in 1942, Air Cargo World aims to provide air logistics professionals with insightful information using data analysis, feature articles, and in-depth coverage of events and trends affecting their business and the airfreight logistics industry. Find all the featured stories, content from the publication, articles, podcasts, upcoming webinars, news, and more from the blog.

name: Bulkloads Podcast
notes:
A trucking podcast that covers all aspects of bulk freight trucking. Hosted by Jared Flinn, owner of multiple trucking-related businesses. 

Jared brings on a new guest weekly to discuss technology, innovation, safety & compliance, insurance, trucking success stories, and much more related to the bulk freight trucking industry.

This podcast hits on all aspects of the industry, our audience includes bulk haulers, shippers, brokers, merchandisers, farmers, and more.

Check out our related businesses for bulk freight:

BulkLoads - www.bulkloads.com

Bulk Insurance Group - www.bulkinsurancegroup.com

Smart Freight Funding - www.smartfreightfunding.com

Transportation Management (TMS) - https://www.bulktms.com/

Permitting- https://www.bulkloads.com/tools/permitting/

name: CDLLife
notes: Your source for trucking news, entertainment, truck driver jobs, truck driver recruiting, and more. CDLLife connects companies with the largest digital audience of truck drivers by creating engaging content and implementing industry-leading technology to increase your visibility to the workforce.

name: CLA Blog
notes: At CLA, we're experienced in delivering integrated wealth advisory, outsourcing, audit, tax, and consulting services to help you succeed professionally and personally. With a virtual headquarters, our "team of teams" approach allows us to have professionals conveniently located in communities across the country.

name: Commercial Carrier Journal
notes: Commercial Carrier Journal offers news, analysis and other information to managers of trucking companies and commercial truck fleets.

name: DAT Blog
notes: The latest Trucking News, Industry Trends, Trucking Regulations, and Product Reviews from DAT Blog. DAT Freight & Analytics operates the largest truckload freight marketplace in North America.

name: Datex Corporation Blog
notes: Datex is counted on to provide supply chain software, mobile computing solutions and managed services including mobile device management. This enables clients, both large and small to focus on their core business, rather than on typical everyday IT challenges. This approach produces definitive savings in time and labor and boosts productivity.

name: DC Velocity
notes: DC Velocity offers comprehensive logistics coverage, including distribution center and warehouse operations, and strategies that optimize logistics.

name: Expedite Trucking Forums
notes: Stay connected to the largest marketplace and community of expedited trucking owner-operators in North America. Join, share trucking experiences, share tips and tricks, post your questions, and get a resource of information for individuals in the expedited, just-in-time freight industry.

name: ExpeditersOnline.com - Expedited Trucking Owner Operator Careers and Truck Sales
notes: The expedited freight information center. North America's largest resource of information for individuals in the expedited, just-in-time freight industry. Stay connected to the largest marketplace and community of expedited trucking owner operators in North America!

name: FleetOwner
notes: FleetOwner serves executives and maintenance management of commercial truck fleets that operate five or more vehicles, delivering business information about operations, vehicle maintenance, industry regulations and information-management technology. Engaging more than a half million commercial vehicle professionals every month, FleetOwner maintains the largest audience of commercial truck fleet executives available to the industry.

name: Food Logistics Magazine
notes: Food Logistics is the only publication exclusively dedicated to covering the global supply chain solutions for the cold food and beverage industry. Get the latest articles, news, products, blogs and videos from Food Logistics.

name: Freightera Blog
notes: Blog about freight and shipping, LTL & truckload freight, and tips on how to avoid extra charges. Freightera is an online freight marketplace that makes freight shipping transparent and easy.

name: Global Trade Magazine » Global Logistics
notes: If you are looking for the latest news on global logistics and supply chain management, find inside information on global shipping, warehousing, and foreign trade. We are the magazine for U.S. companies doing business globally. We educate and entertain our readers on ways to utilize the global marketplace to increase market share and corporate profits, through creative efficiencies in cargo transportation, banking, joint ventures, outsourcing, and expansion opportunities.

name: HDT Magazine
notes: Heavy Duty Trucking offers daily news and in-depth information on road equipment, operations, regulations, environmental issues, and more. It's the flagship of HDT's online and digital media offerings, which also include e-mail newsletters, webinars, HDT's headline news, blogs, and more.

name: Holland & Knight Blog » Transportation
notes: Holland & Knight's Transportation Blog provides legal analysis of many sectors of the transportation and infrastructure industry including aviation, freight rail, maritime, motor carrier, and transit.

name: Land Line
notes: The top trucking news source for drivers, Land Line specializes in covering business, regulatory and legislative news affecting them. Land Line Media is the official news outlet of the Owner-Operator Independent Drivers Association specializing in trucking news for truck drivers.

name: Logistics Business
notes: Logistics Business Magazine is the only pan-European journal for all aspects of logistics, supply chain, warehousing & materials handling. It covers software solutions, mobile computing, barcoding, RFID, labeling, warehousing, conveying, sortation, packaging systems, automation, robotics, and much more.

name: Logistics Insider
notes: Logistics Insider is an industry-specific logistics company that covers stories, news, and articles around the transportation and logistics ecosystem. We are on a mission to build a platform that will provide logistic professionals from different sectors with a knowledge network in order to engage with the industry. Get insights from India's leading logistics magazine.

name: Logistics Manager
notes: Logistics Manager is the leading monthly magazine for managers in charge of the supply chain of the UK's largest industrial, retail, and commercial organizations. Logistics Manager's editorial focuses on the core competencies essential to modern logistics and supply chain management. On this website, we publish daily news stories, case studies, opinions, and more related to temperature-controlled supplies.

name: My Logistics Magazine
notes: My Logistics Magazine is a magazine dedicated to providing comprehensive coverage of the intermodal logistics industry. We are a magazine produced with CARE (Commentary, Analysis, Reflection and Experience). Our readers value our content because it provides them with insight from some of the smartest minds in the business.

name: Overdrive
notes: Overdrive is a site dedicated to covering the trucking industry as it relates to owner operators. Overdrive has been the trucking industry's trusted source since 1961. Owner-operators looking for the latest trucking news, in-depth reporting, new equipment, custom rigs and more turn to Overdrive.

name: Railway Age
notes: Railway Age editors raise issues and seek solutions. It searches for answers and gets them from across the industry: management, labor, suppliers, government, the financial community, and all the sources that matter. Through interviews, research, conferences, and seminars.

name: Reddit » Freight
notes: This subreddit offers a community for freight brokers to discuss the industry with their colleagues. Come across various new features, share insights, find help & guides, and get road-test advice here.

name: School Transportation News
notes: School Transportation News (STN), is a monthly business-to-business news magazine serving the field of pupil transportation. Our mission is to create content, community, and commerce to support the school transportation industry in getting students to and from school safely and efficiently.

name: ShipHub » Transport
notes: ShipHub is a platform that allows you to reduce transport costs. The rates of transport are constantly changing. By using ShipHub, and completing the form once, you will receive offers prepared individually for you by verified shipping companies.

name: Shipping and Freight Resource - Educational Blog about Shipping and Freight
notes: This is an educational site that endeavours to explain and discuss interactively, practically and in simple terms, the processes and procedures involved in the shipping and freight industry. This blog covers a variety of topics ranging from imports to exports to hazardous goods to types of containers to types of ships, and other items of interest relating to the shipping, freight, container.

name: Supply Chain Quarterly
notes: Supply Chain Xchange provides high-value business intelligence and cutting-edge ideas on all aspects of the global supply chain.

name: Supply Chain World
notes: Supply Chain World gives you the latest updates from the supply chain industry, covering all aspects of the supply network and efficiency. Find out more.

name: The Lead Pedal Podcast with Bruce Outridge Blog
notes: The Lead Pedal Podcast aims to be a positive voice for truck drivers in the transportation industry. The Lead Pedal Podcast is a show for those in the trucking industry wanting to improve their trucking careers or businesses. We are hoping this information will help you become a professional driver faster than if you didn’t know about many of these topics.

name: The Truckersreport Forum
notes: TruckersReport is a network of professional truck drivers connected by our trucking industry forum, which provides an independent community for drivers to share information and assist each other's careers. Get all your questions about the best truck driver jobs and training answered by thousands of experienced truckers.

name: Transport & Logistics Magazine
notes: Transport & Logistics is a monthly magazine bringing you the latest haulage news plus fleet news, bus & coach news and the latest warehouse news. At Transport & Logistics Magazine we pride ourselves in our ability to keep you informed.

name: Transport Topics News
notes: Transport Topics is the nation's logistics and trucking news leader, with award-winning coverage of the regulatory, technology, business, and equipment sectors. Their goal is to be the premier source of news and information for the U.S. freight transportation industry, with an emphasis on trucking, logistics and intermodal operations.

name: Transport Works Blog
notes: Stay ahead with expert logistics trends, tips, & best practices. Explore strategies for smarter supply chains & seamless operations. Transport Works offers comprehensive logistics, supply chain, and distribution services across New Zealand, the United States of America, and Australia. Their expertise includes warehousing, fulfilment, distribution, business intelligence, and KPI reporting

name: Transportation and Logistics International
notes: Transportation & Logistics International covers the crucial issues that face senior management across the entire spectrum of the transportation market. Discover the latest news within the transportation & logistics industry, and stay up to date with the latest information and trends from across the industry.

name: Transportation Today
notes: Transportation Today is a publication of Macallan Communications. It is your daily source of news about the latest regulations and innovations that drive the transportation industry across its diverse network: roadways, railroads, aviation, and maritime.

name: Truck Driver News » Trucking Industry
notes: Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the trucking industry through our industry articles covering breaking news, emerging trends, and key updates that impact drivers, fleet owners, and logistics professionals. From regulatory changes and advancements in trucking technology to shifts in market dynamics and industry forecasts, we provide comprehensive coverage of everything shaping the world of trucking.

name: Truck Report Geeks
notes: Truck Report Geeks is a go-to blog for truck owners and drivers seeking to stay informed about various aspects of the trucking industry. It features content on vehicle comparisons that help readers make educated purchasing decisions, maintenance advice to prolong the life of their trucks, and market trend analysis to keep up with industry changes. The blog's expert insights help truckers adapt to new challenges, maintain optimal vehicle performance, and capitalize on opportunities that can enhance their careers and operational success.

name: Trucking Boards Forums
notes: Join the largest trucking forum. Hold meet-ups with other members,  discuss all your questions about the best truck and training, find how-to videos, and get answered by thousands of experienced truckers.

name: Trucking Dive
notes: Transport Dive provides in-depth journalism and insight into the news and trends shaping the trucking industry. The newsletter and website cover topics such as technology, workforce, safety, infrastructure, and more.

name: Trucking Magazine
notes: Trucking is a true champion of the road transport industry. Its news covers everything from the latest industry developments to alternative fuels, legislation & licensing, both for drivers and operators. Comments, opinion features, success stories, and letters enable everyone, including key players from within the industry, a voice on all matters concerning this key sector.

name: Trucks and Heavy Equipment Digital Magazine
notes: The bimonthly publication Trucks & Heavy Equipment, is available nationally every second month of the year and is a 'one-stop' source of news, comment and opinion for all those involved in the rapidly growing Business of Trucks. The magazine covers news about every weight segment for commercial vehicles - LCVs, medium trucks, heavy trucks and extra-heavy trucks, and buses.

name: Trucks, Parts, Service
notes: Truck Parts & Service is the oldest and only publication written and edited exclusively for the heavy-duty aftermarket. Truck Parts & Service helps readers keep customers trucks running by the most efficient and profitable means possible.

name: Union of Concerned Scientists Blog » Transportation
notes: The Union of Concerned Scientists is a national nonprofit organization founded more than 50 years ago by scientists and students at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. Our mission is to use rigorous, independent science to solve our planet's most pressing problems. In the transportation blog, our experts examine the role of transportation in tackling climate change.

name: Urban Transport Magazine
notes: The Urban Transport Magazine (UTM) is an innovative Online Magazine for the entire urban & public transport sector worldwide. UTM is entirely free and offers daily up-to-date articles and detailed analyses on vehicles, infrastructure, network planning, transport development, transport policies, and the latest innovative trends such as autonomous driving, digitalization, and Mobility as a Service application (MaaS).

name: Warehouse & Logistics News
notes: Warehouse & Logistics News is the UK's only fortnightly magazine for the warehousing, distribution, logistics, storage, and handling industry.  We combine the best of printed and new media to get your message to the senior buyers and decision-makers in the warehousing and logistics industry.
